Name: Looks Familiar
Ingredients: 15 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: STIR malt with ice and then strain and discard excess to leave the ice and mixing glass coated. Add other ingredients and STIR with the coated ice. Strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: I defy you not to love this herbal bittersweet tequila-laced concoction.
History: Created by Jake Burger at Jake's Bar, Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Looks Familiar contains 236 calories
